description:
Don't think that this is a low quality course by seeing the price, Teaching is something i love, i don't want to quote a high price for sharing my knowledge. Start Learning Now!

Using my techniques, you’ll learn how I made $35,000 per year building profitable niche websites.

I will offer email and Skype support to every student who asks for it. If you have a problem/question, send me a message and I will reply as soon as I can. Facebook group is created to discuss about the course.

With the sheer abundance of websites in this day and age, ranking on the front pages of Google is no easy task. But by using keyword research methodologies and targeting specific user groups (or “niches”), you will be able to create revenue.


The course will begin by teaching you how to find a proper niche to target and how keyword research plays into the goal of Search Engine Optimization.

Once we have found a good niche, I will show you how we can design and develop beautiful websites from scratch.

You will learn :

» Finding The Niche To Target

» Searching And Finding The Low Competition and High CPC Keywords

» Setting Up The Domain , Hosting And Wordpress

» Designing A High Quality Niche Website Without Writing A Single Line Of Code

» Monetize the niche website with Adsense , Amazon and Clickbank.

» Finding the right products for the niche from Amazon and Clickbank.

» Placing Google Ads to Get High Conversion

» Flipping the niche site for more profits.

By the end of the course you will have built a professional looking, and profitable niche website!
title: Build Profitable Wordpress Niche Websites From Scratch
